title: All Ball - Luka/Zion are Bird/Barkley; Dayton's a #1 seed; Big Ten Network's Dave Revsine talks top teams, conference tourney
itunes:title: All Ball - Luka/Zion are Bird/Barkley; Dayton's a #1 seed; Big Ten Network's Dave Revsine talks top teams, conference tourney
description:
This week, Gottlieb thinks we're watching the next Larry Bird and Barkley in Luka Doncic and Zion Williamson, why he believes Dayton deserves a #1 seed. This week's guest is Big Ten Network host and play-by-play announcer Dave Revsine looks at some of the top teams as the conference tournament play approaches, the case for Iowa's Luka Garza as national player of the year, which B1G teams can make some March Madness noise, and who's on the outside looking in. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
